channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Popup Builder by OptinMonster
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Popup Builder by OptinMonster

item.title: CVE-2023-0772|2023-03-13T16:03:30.688Z -- unknown -- popup%20builder%20by%20optinmonster
item.description: The Popup Builder by OptinMonster WordPress plugin before 2.12.2 does not ensure that the campaign to be loaded via some shortcodes is actually a campaign, allowing any authenticated users such as subscriber to retrieve the content of arbitrary posts, like draft, private or even password protected ones.
